abstract: Diego de Giorgi is set to become the co-head of global corporate and investment banking for Europe at Bank of America.
snippet: Diego de Giorgi is set to become the co-head of global corporate and investment banking for Europe at Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Diego de Giorgi, a senior Goldman Sachs executive, is leaving the firm to take a top position at Bank of America Merrill Lynch.

headline.main: Goldman Executive to Join Bank of America
